00021 cWormhole::cWormhole()
00022 {
00023     nLists = 1;
00024     whSectors = 200;
00025     circleSectors = 25; // circleSectors + 1
00026     nControlPoints = 20;
00027     t=4;           // degree of polynomial = t-1
00028 
00029     makeObject();
00030

00041 cWormhole::~cWormhole()
00042 {
00043     glDeleteLists(object, nLists);
00044     for (int i = 0; i < whSectors; i++)
00045     {
00046         delete[] sectors[i].circle;
00047         delete[] sectors[i].normals;

00060 void cWormhole::makeObject(QProgressBar * progress_bar, QLabel * progress_label)
00061 {
00062     sectors = new sSector[whSectors];
00063     for (int i = 0; i < whSectors; i++)
00064     {
00065         sectors[i].circle = new sPoint3[circleSectors];
00066         sectors[i].normals = new sPoint3[circleSectors];
00067     }
00068 
00069     initializeWormholeCoordinates();
00070 
00071     bsplineSectorPoints(nControlPoints, t, listControlPoints, sectors,
00072                         whSectors);
00073     bsplineSectorRadius(nControlPoints, t, listControlRadiusPoints, sectors,
00074                         whSectors);
00075     genCircles(sectors);
00076     genNormals(sectors);
00077 }

00086 void cWormhole::initializeWormholeCoordinates()
00087 {
00088 //    listControlPoints.clear();
00089 //    listControlRadiusPoints.clear();
00090 
00091     srand ( time(NULL) );
00092     sPoint3 tmpPoint;
00093     for(int i=-(nControlPoints+1); i < 0 ; i++)
00094     {
00095         tmpPoint.x = i;
00096         listControlPoints.append(tmpPoint);
00097         tmpPoint.x = i;
00098         listControlRadiusPoints.append(tmpPoint);
00099     }
00100 
00101     int n = listControlPoints.size();
00102     for(int i=0; i<n; i++)
00103     {
00104         listControlPoints.removeFirst();
00105         tmpPoint.x = listControlPoints.last().x + 1.0;
00106         tmpPoint.y = (rand() % 2000 - 1000) / 1000.0;
00107         tmpPoint.z = (rand() % 2000 - 1000) / 1000.0;
00108         if(i<4)
00109         {
00110             tmpPoint.y = 0.0;
00111             tmpPoint.z = 0.0;
00112         }
00113         listControlPoints.append(tmpPoint);
00114 
00115         listControlRadiusPoints.removeFirst();
00116         tmpPoint.x = listControlRadiusPoints.last().x + 1.0;
00117         tmpPoint.y = (rand() % 400 + 200) / 1000.0;
00118         tmpPoint.z = 0.0;
00119         listControlRadiusPoints.append(tmpPoint);
00120     }
00121 }

00131 void cWormhole::updateObject(int newWhSectors, int newCircleSectors)
00132 {
00133     for (int i = 0; i < whSectors; i++)
00134     {
00135         delete[] sectors[i].circle;
00136         delete[] sectors[i].normals;
00137     }
00138     delete[] sectors;
00139 
00140     whSectors = newWhSectors;
00141     circleSectors = newCircleSectors;
00142 
00143     sectors = new sSector[whSectors];
00144     for (int i = 0; i < whSectors; i++)
00145     {
00146         sectors[i].circle = new sPoint3[circleSectors];
00147         sectors[i].normals = new sPoint3[circleSectors];
00148     }
00149 
00150     bsplineSectorPoints(nControlPoints, t, listControlPoints, sectors,
00151                         whSectors);
00152     bsplineSectorRadius(nControlPoints, t, listControlRadiusPoints, sectors,
00153                         whSectors);
00154     genCircles(sectors);
00155     genNormals(sectors);
00156 }

00170 GLuint cWormhole::makeDisplayList(int polygons)
00171 {
00172     GLuint list = glGenLists(nLists);
00173     glNewList(list, GL_COMPILE);
00174 
00175     qglColor(QColor::fromRgb(145, 44, 238));
00176     //glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT);
00177     if(polygons)
00178         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00179     else
00180         glBegin(GL_TRIANGLES);
00181         for (int j=0; j<whSectors-1; j++)
00182         {
00183             for(int i=0; i<circleSectors-1; i++)
00184             {
00185                 /*qglColor(trolltechGreen.dark((int)(250 +\
00186                                               sin(1.5*sectors[j].circle[i].x) *\
00187                                               100)));*/
00188                 if(polygons)
00189                 {
00190                     quad(sectors[j].normals[i], sectors[j].circle[i],
00191                          sectors[j+1].normals[i], sectors[j+1].circle[i],
00192                          sectors[j+1].normals[i+1], sectors[j+1].circle[i+1],
00193                          sectors[j].normals[i+1], sectors[j].circle[i+1]);
00194                 } else
00195                 {
00196                     triangle(sectors[j].normals[i], sectors[j].circle[i],
00197                          sectors[j+1].normals[i], sectors[j+1].circle[i],
00198                          sectors[j+1].normals[i+1], sectors[j+1].circle[i+1]);
00199                     triangle(sectors[j+1].normals[i+1], sectors[j+1].circle[i+1],
00200                          sectors[j].normals[i+1], sectors[j].circle[i+1],
00201                          sectors[j].normals[i], sectors[j].circle[i]);
00202                 }
00203             }
00204             int last = circleSectors-1;
00205             if(polygons)
00206             {
00207                 quad(sectors[j].normals[last], sectors[j].circle[last],
00208                      sectors[j+1].normals[last], sectors[j+1].circle[last],
00209                      sectors[j+1].normals[0], sectors[j+1].circle[0],
00210                      sectors[j].normals[0], sectors[j].circle[0]);
00211             } else
00212             {
00213                 triangle(sectors[j].normals[last],sectors[j].circle[last],
00214                      sectors[j+1].normals[last], sectors[j+1].circle[last],
00215                      sectors[j+1].normals[0], sectors[j+1].circle[0]);
00216                 triangle(sectors[j+1].normals[0], sectors[j+1].circle[0],
00217                      sectors[j].normals[0], sectors[j].circle[0],
00218                      sectors[j].normals[last], sectors[j].circle[last]);
00219             }
00220         }
00221     glEnd();
00222 
00223     glEndList();
00224     
00225     return list;
00226 }

00243 void cWormhole::genCircles(sSector *sectors)
00244 {
00245     for(int i=0; i < whSectors; i++)
00246     {
00247         const double Pi = 3.14159265358979323846;
00248         float ax = sectors[i].splinePoint.x;//1000.0;
00249         float ay = sectors[i].splinePoint.y;//1000.0;
00250         float az = sectors[i].splinePoint.z;//1000.0;
00251         float bx = sectors[i+1].splinePoint.x;//1000.0;
00252         float by = sectors[i+1].splinePoint.y;//1000.0;
00253         float bz = sectors[i+1].splinePoint.z;//1000.0;
00254 
00255         float w0 = bx-ax;
00256         float w1 = by-ay;
00257         float w2 = bz-az;
00258         float factor;
00259         float u0, u1, u2;
00260         float v0, v1, v2;
00261 
00262         float w3d = sqrt(w0*w0+w1*w1+w2*w2);
00263         w0 = w0/w3d; // normalizing
00264         w1 = w1/w3d; // normalizing
00265         w2 = w2/w3d; // normalizing
00266 
00267 //        if (fabs(w0) >= fabs(w1)) {
00268             factor = 1/sqrt(w0*w0+w2*w2);
00269             u0 = -w2*factor;
00270             u1 = 0;
00271             u2 = w0*factor;
00272 /*        } else {
00273             factor = 1/sqrt(w1*w1+w2*w2);
00274             u0 = 0;
00275             u1 = w2*factor;
00276             u2 = -w1*factor;
00277         }*/
00278 
00279         /*float u3d = sqrt(u0*u0+u1*u1+u2*u2);
00280         u0 = u0/u3d; // normalizing
00281         u1 = u1/u3d; // normalizing
00282         u2 = u2/u3d; // normalizing*/
00283         //a x b = (a2b3 - a3b2)i + (a3b1 - a1b3)j + (a1b2 - a2b1)k
00284         //V = Cross(W,U);
00285         v0 = w1*u2 - w2*u1;
00286         v1 = w2*u0 - w0*u2;
00287         v2 = w0*u1 - w1*u0;
00288 
00289         /*float v3d = sqrt(v0*v0+v1*v1+v2*v2);
00290         v0 = v0/v3d; // normalizing
00291         v1 = v1/v3d; // normalizing
00292         v2 = v2/v3d; // normalizing*/
00293         //X(t) = C + (r*cos(t))*U + (r*sin(t))*V
00294         int j;
00295         float circleRadius = sectors[i].radius;
00296         for (j = 0; j < circleSectors; ++j) {
00297             double angle1 = (j * 2 * Pi) / (circleSectors);
00298             sectors[i].circle[j].x = ax + (circleRadius*cos(angle1))*u0 \
00299                                         + (circleRadius*sin(angle1))*v0;
00300             sectors[i].circle[j].y = ay + (circleRadius*cos(angle1))*u1 \
00301                                         + (circleRadius*sin(angle1))*v1;
00302             sectors[i].circle[j].z = az + (circleRadius*cos(angle1))*u2 \
00303                                         + (circleRadius*sin(angle1))*v2;
00304         }
00305         /*sectors[i].circle[circleSectors-1].x = ax + (circleRadius*cos(0))*u0 \
00306                                     + (circleRadius*sin(0))*v0;
00307         sectors[i].circle[circleSectors-1].y = ay + (circleRadius*cos(0))*u1 \
00308                                     + (circleRadius*sin(0))*v1;
00309         sectors[i].circle[circleSectors-1].z = az + (circleRadius*cos(0))*u2 \
00310                                     + (circleRadius*sin(0))*v2;*/
00311         /*sectors[i].w.x = ax+w0/2.;
00312         sectors[i].w.y = ay+w1/2.;
00313         sectors[i].w.z = az+w2/2.;
00314         sectors[i].u.x = ax+u0/2.;
00315         sectors[i].u.y = ay+u1/2.;
00316         sectors[i].u.z = az+u2/2.;
00317         sectors[i].v.x = ax+v0/2.;
00318         sectors[i].v.y = ay+v1/2.;
00319         sectors[i].v.z = az+v2/2.;
00320         sectors[i].a.x = ax;
00321         sectors[i].a.y = ay;
00322         sectors[i].a.z = az;*/
00323     }
00324 }
00325 
00335 void cWormhole::genNormals(sSector *sectors)
00336 {
00337     for (int j=0; j<whSectors; j++)
00338     {
00339         for(int i=0; i<circleSectors; i++)
00340         {
00341             sectors[j].normals[i].x = 0.0;
00342             sectors[j].normals[i].y = 0.0;
00343             sectors[j].normals[i].z = 0.0;
00344         }
00345     }
00346     
00347     sPoint3 tempPoint;
00348     for (int j=0; j<whSectors-1; j++)
00349     {
00350         for(int i=0; i < circleSectors-1; i++)
00351         {
00352             tempPoint = computeFaceNormal(sectors[j].circle[i],\
00353                                           sectors[j+1].circle[i],\
00354                                           sectors[j+1].circle[i+1]);
00355             sectors[j].normals[i].x += tempPoint.x;
00356             sectors[j].normals[i].y += tempPoint.y;
00357             sectors[j].normals[i].z += tempPoint.z;
00358             sectors[j+1].normals[i].x += tempPoint.x;
00359             sectors[j+1].normals[i].y += tempPoint.y;
00360             sectors[j+1].normals[i].z += tempPoint.z;
00361             sectors[j+1].normals[i+1].x += tempPoint.x;
00362             sectors[j+1].normals[i+1].y += tempPoint.y;
00363             sectors[j+1].normals[i+1].z += tempPoint.z;
00364             sectors[j].normals[i+1].x += tempPoint.x;
00365             sectors[j].normals[i+1].y += tempPoint.y;
00366             sectors[j].normals[i+1].z += tempPoint.z;
00367         }
00368         tempPoint = computeFaceNormal(sectors[j].circle[circleSectors-1],\
00369                                       sectors[j+1].circle[circleSectors-1],\
00370                                       sectors[j+1].circle[0]);
00371         sectors[j].normals[circleSectors-1].x += tempPoint.x;
00372         sectors[j].normals[circleSectors-1].y += tempPoint.y;
00373         sectors[j].normals[circleSectors-1].z += tempPoint.z;
00374         sectors[j+1].normals[circleSectors-1].x += tempPoint.x;
00375         sectors[j+1].normals[circleSectors-1].y += tempPoint.y;
00376         sectors[j+1].normals[circleSectors-1].z += tempPoint.z;
00377         sectors[j+1].normals[0].x += tempPoint.x;
00378         sectors[j+1].normals[0].y += tempPoint.y;
00379         sectors[j+1].normals[0].z += tempPoint.z;
00380         sectors[j].normals[0].x += tempPoint.x;
00381         sectors[j].normals[0].y += tempPoint.y;
00382         sectors[j].normals[0].z += tempPoint.z;
00383     }
00384 
00385     normalizeVertexNormals();
00386 }
00387 
00396 sPoint3 cWormhole::computeFaceNormal(sPoint3 point0, sPoint3 point1,
00397                                      sPoint3 point2)
00398 {
00399     sPoint3 retPoint;
00400 
00401     float dx1 = point1.x - point0.x;
00402     float dy1 = point1.y - point0.y;
00403     float dz1 = point1.z - point0.z;
00404     float dx2 = point2.x - point0.x;
00405     float dy2 = point2.y - point0.y;
00406     float dz2 = point2.z - point0.z;
00407     retPoint.x = dy1*dz2 - dz1*dy2;
00408     retPoint.y = dz1*dx2 - dx1*dz2;
00409     retPoint.z = dx1*dy2 - dy1*dx2;
00410     float d = sqrt(retPoint.x*retPoint.x + retPoint.y*retPoint.y + \
00411                    retPoint.z*retPoint.z);
00412     if (d == 0.0)
00413     {
00414       retPoint.x = 1;
00415       retPoint.y = 0;
00416       retPoint.z = 0;
00417     }
00418     else
00419     {
00420       retPoint.x /= d;
00421       retPoint.y /= d;
00422       retPoint.z /= d;
00423     }
00424     return retPoint;
00425 }
00426 
00434 void cWormhole::normalizeVertexNormals()
00435 {
00436     float d;
00437 
00438     for (int j=0; j<whSectors; j++)
00439     {
00440         for(int i=0; i<circleSectors; i++)
00441         {
00442             d = sqrt(sectors[j].normals[i].x*sectors[j].normals[i].x +
00443                      sectors[j].normals[i].y*sectors[j].normals[i].y +
00444                      sectors[j].normals[i].z*sectors[j].normals[i].z);
00445             if (d == 0.0)
00446             {
00447                 sectors[j].normals[i].x = 1;
00448                 sectors[j].normals[i].y = 0;
00449                 sectors[j].normals[i].z = 0;
00450             }
00451             else
00452             {
00453                 sectors[j].normals[i].x = sectors[j].normals[i].x / d;
00454                 sectors[j].normals[i].y = sectors[j].normals[i].y / d;
00455                 sectors[j].normals[i].z = sectors[j].normals[i].z / d;
00456             }
00457         }
00458     }
00459 }
00460 
00472 void cWormhole::bsplineSectorPoints(int n, int t,
00473                                     QList<sPoint3> listPoints,
00474                                     sSector *sectors, int num_sectors)
00475 {
00476   int *u;
00477   double increment,interval;
00478   sPoint3 calcxyz;
00479   int output_index;
00480 
00481   u = new int[n+t+1];
00482   compute_intervals(u, n, t);
00483 
00484   increment = (double) (n-t+2)/(num_sectors-1);  // how much parameter goes up each time
00485   interval = 0;
00486 
00487   for(output_index=0; output_index<num_sectors-1; output_index++)
00488   {
00489     compute_point(u, n, t, interval, listPoints, &calcxyz);
00490     sectors[output_index].splinePoint.x = calcxyz.x;
00491     sectors[output_index].splinePoint.y = calcxyz.y;
00492     sectors[output_index].splinePoint.z = calcxyz.z;
00493     interval=interval+increment;  // increment our parameter
00494   }
00495   // last point
00496   sectors[num_sectors-1].splinePoint.x = listPoints.at(n).x;
00497   sectors[num_sectors-1].splinePoint.y = listPoints.at(n).y;
00498   sectors[num_sectors-1].splinePoint.z = listPoints.at(n).z;
00499 
00500   delete u;
00501 }
00502 
00514 void cWormhole::bsplineSectorRadius(int n, int t,
00515                                     QList<sPoint3> listPoints,
00516                                     sSector *sectors, int num_sectors)
00517 {
00518   int *u;
00519   double increment,interval;
00520   sPoint3 calcxyz;
00521   int output_index;
00522 
00523   u = new int[n+t+1];
00524   compute_intervals(u, n, t);
00525 
00526   increment = (double) (n-t+2)/(num_sectors-1);  // how much parameter goes up each time
00527   interval = 0;
00528 
00529   for(output_index=0; output_index<num_sectors-1; output_index++)
00530   {
00531     compute_point(u, n, t, interval, listPoints, &calcxyz);
00532     sectors[output_index].radius = calcxyz.y;
00533     interval=interval+increment;  // increment our parameter
00534   }
00535   // last point
00536   sectors[num_sectors-1].radius = listPoints.at(n).y;
00537 
00538   delete [] u;
00539 }
00540 
00541 double cWormhole::blend(int k, int t, int *u, double v)  // calculate the blending value
00542 {
00543   double value;
00544 
00545   if (t==1)         // base case for the recursion
00546   {
00547     if ((u[k]<=v) && (v<u[k+1]))
00548       value=1;
00549     else
00550       value=0;
00551   }
00552   else
00553   {
00554     if ((u[k+t-1]==u[k]) && (u[k+t]==u[k+1]))  // check for divide by zero
00555       value = 0;
00556     else
00557     if (u[k+t-1]==u[k]) // if a term's denominator is zero,use just the other
00558       value = (u[k+t] - v) / (u[k+t] - u[k+1]) * blend(k+1, t-1, u, v);
00559     else
00560     if (u[k+t]==u[k+1])
00561       value = (v - u[k]) / (u[k+t-1] - u[k]) * blend(k, t-1, u, v);
00562     else
00563       value = (v - u[k]) / (u[k+t-1] - u[k]) * blend(k, t-1, u, v) +
00564           (u[k+t] - v) / (u[k+t] - u[k+1]) * blend(k+1, t-1, u, v);
00565   }
00566   return value;
00567 }
00568 
00569 void cWormhole::compute_intervals(int *u, int n, int t)   // figure out the knots
00570 {
00571   int j;
00572 
00573   for (j=0; j<=n+t; j++)
00574   {
00575     if (j<t)
00576       u[j]=0;
00577     else
00578     if ((t<=j) && (j<=n))
00579       u[j]=j-t+1;
00580     else
00581     if (j>n)
00582       u[j]=n-t+2;  // if n-t=-2 then we're screwed, everything goes to 0
00583   }
00584 }
00585 
00586 void cWormhole::compute_point(int *u, int n, int t, double v,
00587                               QList<sPoint3> listPoints, sPoint3 *output)
00588 {
00589   int k;
00590   double temp;
00591 
00592   // initialize the variable that will hold outputted point
00593   output->x=0;
00594   output->y=0;
00595   output->z=0;
00596 
00597   for (k=0; k<=n; k++)
00598   {
00599     temp = blend(k,t,u,v);  // same blend is used for each dimension coordinate
00600     output->x = output->x + listPoints.at(k).x * temp;
00601     output->y = output->y + listPoints.at(k).y * temp;
00602     output->z = output->z + listPoints.at(k).z * temp;
00603   }
00604 }
